title: I said YES to everythingâ€¦ I regret it
description: Visit  and use offer code LTT for 10% off  Create your build at   You might think we only get sent the hottest new computer hardware from the likes of Nvidia, AMD, ASUS, Gigabyte etc. But we actually get sent a lot of weird stuff. And far weirder emails. Which is why we opened the floodgates and said yes to everything that was sent to us for a whole month. Boy there is a lot of weird stuff battery banks, lasers, bad VR, even a Steam Deck competitor!  Discuss on the forum:   Check out the Optimus Prime Robot from Robosen:  Buy a FOSSiBot Rugged Smartphone:  Buy A KOBOTIX Real Racer RC Car:  Check out the xTool D1 Pro Desktop Laser Engraver:  Buy a GravaStar Supernova Portable Speaker:  Buy a GravaStar GaN USB C Wall Charger Block:  Buy a Coolwill Rotating Laptop Stand:  Buy an iKKO Audio ITX05 Docking Station on AliExpress:  Buy BGVP DM9 HiFi Earphones:  Buy LINNER Nova Hearing Aids:  Buy an EleMake Keyless Fingerprint Door Lock:  Buy an Aokzoe A1 Handheld Gaming PC:  Check out the abxylute Handheld Gaming Console:  Buy a Logitech G Cloud Handheld Gaming Console:  Check out the CUKTECH P01 Power Bank:  Check out the Omnicharge Omni 40+:  Buy a GOOVIS Pro Personal Mobile Cinema:  Check out the AndaSeat Kaiser 3 Gaming Chair:  Check out Moza Racing:  Buy a RANVOO AICE3 Neck Air Conditioner:  Buy an Oral-B i0 Series 9 Electric Toothbrush:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.   GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   EQUIPMENT WE USE TO FILM LTT:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0   Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Intro 0:41 Robosen Optimus Prime 1:57 Fossibot Phone 3:51 Kobotix RC Cars 5:39 The Laser 6:34 Gravastar SuperNova 8:25 Laptop Stand 8:47 Ikko ITX05 10:06 BGVP DM9 13:03 Linner Nova 14:59 Elemake Door Lock 15:55 AOKZOE A1 18:03 Batteries 19:55 GOOVIS 21:28 Anda Seat 22:08 Moza Racing 23:05 Ranvoo AICE 23:49 Oral B iO 9
